SEARCH
Module com.example.protrack
Package com.example.protrack.customer

Interface CustomerDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerDAOImplementation
public interface CustomerDAO
Interface for CustomerDAO operations. Provides a contract for CRUD operations and customer-related queries.

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      void createTable()
      Creates the customer table in the database if it doesn't exist.

    • isTableEmpty

      boolean isTableEmpty()
      Checks if the customer table is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the customer table is empty, false otherwise.

    • addCustomer

      boolean addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • getCustomer

      Customer getCustomer(Integer customerId)
      Retrieves a customer from the database based on the provided customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Customer object if found, otherwise null.

    • dropTable

      void dropTable()
      Drops the customer table from the database if it exists.

    • getAllCustomers

      List<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Retrieves all customers from the database.
      Returns:
      A List of Customer objects.

    • updateCustomer

      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates an existing customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object containing updated details.

    • deleteCustomer

      boolean deleteCustomer(int customerId)
      Deletes a customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was deleted, false otherwise.

    • searchCustomers

      List<Customer> searchCustomers(String query)
      Searches for customers based on a query string.
      Parameters:
      query - The search query.
      Returns:
      A List of Customer objects matching the search.

    • getOrdersForCustomer

      List<WorkOrder> getOrdersForCustomer(Integer customerId)
      Retrieves all work orders associated with a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose work orders are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A List of WorkOrder objects associated with the customer.
